sentences.english: I'm not gonna be a bouncer in this thing.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想成为一个和事佬。

sentences.english: Yvan, less self-assured, acts as a mediator between the two.
sentences.chinese: 伊万缺少自我肯定，在他俩当中充当和事佬。

sentences.english: that you feel like you're not going to even get in between and you're not going to become a mediator.
sentences.chinese: 让你觉得你甚至都不想介入其中或扮演和事佬的角色。

sentences.english: Hill tried to play the peacemaker.
He sent fawzi, known as a conciliator, to washington.
sentences.chinese: 他把以和事佬知名的法齐派来华盛顿。

sentences.english: Their five-year-old little darling intervened, trying to be the peace-maker.
sentences.chinese: 五岁的小毛头站在中间欲做“和事佬”。

sentences.english: I, for one, am a big peacemaker.
sentences.chinese: 就我来说，我是个超级和事佬。

sentences.english: Mr. Gates Sr. played the role of peacemaker.
sentences.chinese: 老盖茨这时则扮演了和事佬的角色。

sentences.english: Paul will not continue to arbitrate their arguments.
sentences.chinese: 保罗不会继承替他们的吵架做和事佬吧。

sentences.english: Thinking for a while, Father decided to be the peace-maker and solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 想了一下，爸爸决定当和事佬并解决这个问题。

sentences.english: He will be a peacemaker whenever a quarrel happens.
sentences.chinese: 别人一吵架，他总要充当和事佬这一角色。
